BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: Friends of the Cultural Center Inc

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: The McCallum Theatre's mission is to entertain and educate the public by offering a variety of performing arts experiences that reflects the diversity of people, interest, and tastes of the communities and constituents served by the Theatre.
IRS990.MissionDesc: The McCallum Theatre's mission is to entertain and educate the public by offering a variety of performing arts experiences that reflects the diversity of people, interest, and tastes of the communities and constituents served by the Theatre.
IRS990.Desc: Provided a variety of performing arts experiences that reflects the diversity of people, interest, and tastes of the communities and constituents served by the Theatre. Provided entertainment and educated the public through the performing arts, with a focus on serving the youth of the Coachella Valley. Promoted and ensured the financial health of the theatre and its long-term viability as a cultural institution by operating efficiently and building a broad base of community support and worked collaboratively with other arts and community organizations in the Coachella Valley.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part III, Line 4: Description of organization's collections and how it furthers its purpose.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ARTWORK IS ON PUBLIC EXHIBITION IN THE THEATRE TO ENHANCE THE ENJOYMENT OF THE AUDIENCES ATTENDING THE PERFORMANCES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A number of donors have directed their current and future donations to establish a permanent endowment to provide income for the McCallum Theatre's operation and programming. The Board of Trustees established a long-term investment policy statement for the Foundation. The Board of Trustees also established a formula to calculate the distribution from the Foundation to the operating fund that factor allocations to the base principal, available assets and adjustments for annual valuation of the consumer price index at December 31 of each year.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The membership allows the Theatre to sustain its annual operating budget and in return receives benefits including priority ticket purchasing opportunities.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A draft copy of the tax return is made available to the executive committee and is reviewed by the CEO and CFO prior to filing the return.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: An annual questionnaire is signed by the Board of Trustee members to disclose any conflicts of interest.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A Compensation Committee determines salaries by securing data that documents compensation levels for similarly qualified individuals in like positions at like organizations. The Committee must document how it reached its decisions including the data on which it relied.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A Compensation Committee determines salaries by securing data that documents compensation levels for similarly qualified individuals in like positions at like organizations. The Committee must document how it reached its decisions including the data on which it relied.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Copies of Governing docs, audited financial statements, and conflict of interest policy are not made available to the public.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: Support Friends of the Cultural Ctr., Inc.
